Package net.fortuna.ical4j.util

Contains utility types that provide supporting functionality for iCal4j.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Base64 Encodes and decodes to and from Base64 notation.
Base64.InputStream A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
Base64.OutputStream A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
Constants Provides some convenience methods for working with constant parameters and properties.
DateFormat Deprecated. Use net.fortuna.ical4j.model.Date instead.
Dates Implements a collection of utility methods relevant to date processing.
DateTimeFormat Deprecated. Use net.fortuna.ical4j.model.DateTime instead.
DurationFormat Deprecated. Use net.fortuna.ical4j.model.Dur instead.
Numbers A utility class for number processing.
ParameterValidator Defines methods for validating parameters and parameter lists.
PropertyValidator Defines methods for validating properties and property lists.
StringUtils Utility methods for working with parameters.
TimeZoneUtils Utility methods relevant to Java timezones.
UtcOffsetFormat Deprecated. use net.fortuna.ical4j.model.UtcOffset instead.
 

Package net.fortuna.ical4j.util Description

Contains utility types that provide supporting functionality for iCal4j.
